name: Neighbortree.com
overview:
neighbortree.com is a network of free, independent community websites for virtually any type of residential community including subdivisions, urban neighborhoods, subdivisions, apartment buildings, condos and even small town and cities.

Our neighborhood social networking system is based on the latest Web 2.0 technology. We offer most of the interactive features you find on popular social networking websites.

Our platform enables us to instantly create neighborhood websites with features such as news, announcements, comments, forums, calendars, member pages, polling, private messaging - with many new features in development.

milestones.description: neighbortree.com, a leading provider of free neighborhood social networking community websites, has partnered with Mission Hills Magazine, the leading life and style magazine for residents of Mission Hills KS
milestones.source_description: neighbortree.com Partners with Mission Hills Magazine
